size_classes.name: Residential
size_classes.notes: Based on 2023 NREL residential benchmark of $2.68/WDC (Ramasamy et al., 2023)

size_classes.name: Light Commercial
size_classes.notes: Based on NREL commercial benchmarks with size-based scaling

size_classes.name: Heavy Commercial
size_classes.notes: Based on NREL 200kW commercial benchmark of $1.78/WDC

size_classes.name: Industrial
size_classes.notes: Transition scale between commercial and utility, upper bound aligned with EIA utility definition of 5MW

size_classes.name: Utility
size_classes.notes: Based on NREL utility benchmark of $1.56/WAC (adjusted for DC), EIA data shows 86% of utility capacity from systems >50MW

size_classes.name: Light Commercial
size_classes.notes: Higher than ground-mount due to roof mounting complexity

size_classes.name: Heavy Commercial
size_classes.notes: ~$0.10/W premium over ground-mount due to rooftop installation requirements

size_classes.name: Large Commercial/Industrial
size_classes.notes: Examples include large warehouses and manufacturing facilities

size_classes.name: Mega-Rooftop
size_classes.notes: Upper limit based on DSV Logistics (35MW) and Tesla Gigafactory (30MW) examples
